sentences.sentence: Then came a bunt from Russ Davis.
sentences.translation: 接着鲁斯.戴维斯打出了一记短打。

sentences.sentence: Davis estimated he had been called on to bunt once in six years.
sentences.translation: 戴维斯估计六年来就要求他进行了一次短打。

sentences.sentence: Don't bunt. Aim out of the ballpark.
sentences.translation: 不要短打。目标瞄准场外。
